metadata.titleEn: The experimental data of water consumption in drought stress of desert plants (2013)
metadata.titleCn: 荒漠植物干旱胁迫处理耗水实验数据（2013）
metadata.description:
A small lysimeter was made to simulate the natural conditions and select typical desert plants as the objects to study the water consumption of drought stress treatment. Repeat 3 times for each plant. 
In 2012, the soil water content was kept at (20 ± 5)% of the field water capacity, and experiments on physiological water demand and water consumption were carried out under stress. In 2013, the soil water content was kept at (10 ± 3)% of the field water capacity, and further experiments on water consumption and water consumption law were carried out under drought stress.
metadata.descriptionCn:
自制小型Lysimeter，模拟自然条件，选择典型荒漠植物为对象，研究干旱胁迫处理耗水状况。每种植物重复3次。
2012年，以土壤含水量保持在田间持水量的(20±5)%，进行胁迫情况下，生理需水和耗水规律实验。2013年，以土壤含水量保持在田间持水量的(10±3)%，进一步进行干旱胁迫处理下，耗水量和耗水规律实验。

background: In order to explore canopy photosynthesis of desert plant Calligonum potanini, and characteristics of carbon source and carbon sink in arid desert area, the canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate were measured in high temperature and irradiation and suitable environment periods by the modified assimilation chamber and LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system in two years. The results showed that the difference of canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) of C. potanini in different years and months was significant, the canopy photosynthesis was enhanced significantly with improving soil water. The soil CO2 efflux rate under plant canopy was 0.29 μmol/(m2·s) in the growth period, and it was 0.15 μmol/(m2·s) in desert bare land. The fixed carbon of C. potanini canopy in the growth period was 3.82 g/(m2·a), the released carbon under plant canopy was 1.03 and 0.53 g/(m2·a) in desert bare land in the same period. These results indicated that the increasing in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of desert plant C. potanini exceeded the increasing range of soil water in the layers of root mainly distributed in the water shortage desert area; it doubled in suitable environment period. The soil respiration rate of desert ecosystem was lower and that in desert bare land was about 50% of that under plant canopy. The zone of desert plant C. potanini population was a weak carbon source.
research objective: In order to explore canopy photosynthesis of desert plant Calligonum potanini, and characteristics of carbon source and carbon sink in arid desert area. The study aimed to investigate the carbon assimilation and soil respiration of desert plants to provide foundational data for evaluating the carbon source-sink functions in arid desert regions and offer scientific evidence for studying carbon sequestration potential in arid areas.
methods: In this study, the canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate were measured in high temperature and irradiation and suitable environment periods by the modified assimilation chamber and LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system in two years. The soil CO2 efflux rate under plant canopy was measured using the LI-8100 soil CO2 flux automated measurement system with a 20 cm portable chamber (8100-103). For plant canopy gas exchange measurements, a system composed of the LI-8100 soil CO2 flux automated measurement system and an improved assimilation chamber was used. The assimilation chamber, designed by Beijing Ligotai Technology Co., was made of acrylic material with a light transmittance of over 95% and had dimensions of 50 cm x 50 cm x 50 cm. During measurements, the assimilation chamber was placed on the base, connected to the LI-8100, and the remaining soil was backfilled to ensure the airtightness of the connection between the chamber and the base.
findings: The results showed that the difference of canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) of C. potanini in different years and months was significant, the canopy photosynthesis was enhanced significantly with improving soil water. The fixed carbon of C. potanini canopy in the growth period was 3.82 g/(m2·a), the released carbon under plant canopy was 1.03 and 0.53 g/(m2·a) in desert bare land in the same period. These results indicated that the increasing in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of desert plant C. potanini exceeded the increasing range of soil water in the layers of root mainly distributed in the water shortage desert area; it doubled in suitable environment period. The soil respiration rate of desert ecosystem was lower and that in desert bare land was about 50% of that under plant canopy. The zone of desert plant C. potanini population was a weak carbon source.
backgroundCn: 为了探讨沙漠植物Calligonum potanini的冠层光合作用及干旱沙漠地区碳源和碳汇的特征，在高温和强辐射以及适宜环境时期，采用改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统对冠层表观光合速率和土壤CO2释放速率进行了测量，历时两年。结果显示，C. potanini在不同年份和月份的冠层表观光合速率（CAP）差异显著，随着土壤水分的改善，冠层光合作用显著增强。在生长期间，植物冠层下的土壤CO2释放速率为0.29 μmol/(m2·s)，而在沙漠裸地为0.15 μmol/(m2·s)。C. potanini冠层在生长期间固定的碳为3.82 g/(m2·a)，而在同一时期沙漠裸地下释放的碳分别为1.03和0.53 g/(m2·a)。这些结果表明，沙漠植物C. potanini的冠层表观光合速率的增加超过了主要分布在水分匮乏沙漠地区根层的土壤水分的增加幅度；在适宜环境时期增加了两倍。沙漠生态系统的土壤呼吸速率较低，而沙漠裸地的土壤呼吸速率约为植物冠层下的50%。沙漠植物C. potanini种群区域是一个弱碳源。
research objectiveCn: 为了探讨沙漠植物Calligonum potanini的冠层光合作用以及干旱沙漠地区碳源和碳汇的特征，本研究旨在调查沙漠植物的碳同化和土壤呼吸，以提供基础数据用于评估干旱沙漠地区的碳源-汇功能，并为研究干旱地区的碳固存潜力提供科学依据。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，采用改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统，在高温和辐射以及适宜环境期间测量了冠层表观光合作用和土壤CO2排放速率。使用LI-8100土壤CO2通量自动测量系统和20厘米便携式室（8100-103）测量植物冠层下的土壤CO2排放速率。植物冠层气体交换测量采用由LI-8100土壤CO2通量自动测量系统和改进的同化室组成的系统。同化室由北京Ligotai科技有限公司设计，采用亚克力材料制成，光透过率超过95%，尺寸为50厘米 x 50厘米 x 50厘米。在测量过程中，同化室放置在基座上，连接到LI-8100，剩余土壤回填以确保室与基座之间连接的密封性。
findingsCn: 结果显示，不同年份和月份的 C. potanini 冠层表观光合速率 (CAP) 差异显著，随着土壤水分的改善，冠层光合作用显著增强。在生长期间，C. potanini 冠层的固定碳为 3.82 g/(m2·a)，而在同一时期，沙漠裸地植物冠层下释放的碳分别为 1.03 和 0.53 g/(m2·a)。这些结果表明，沙漠植物 C. potanini 的冠层表观光合速率的增加超过了主要分布在水分匮乏沙漠区根层的土壤水分增加范围；在适宜环境期翻倍。沙漠生态系统的土壤呼吸速率较低，沙漠裸地的土壤呼吸速率约为植物冠层下的 50%。沙漠植物 C. potanini 群落区域是一个弱碳源。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to study water consumption patterns in desert plants under drought stress conditions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究干旱胁迫条件下沙漠植物水分消耗模式的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to study water consumption patterns in desert plants under drought stress conditions involves using a custom-made small lysimeter to simulate natural conditions. This method was applied in an experiment in 2013, where typical desert plants were selected, and drought stress treatments were performed with soil moisture maintained at (10±3)% of field capacity.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于研究沙漠植物在干旱胁迫条件下水分消耗模式的数据收集方法是使用定制的小型蒸发皿来模拟自然条件。该方法在2013年的实验中应用，选择了典型的沙漠植物，并进行了干旱胁迫处理，土壤湿度保持在田间持水量的(10±3)%。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a research approach used to investigate the carbon assimilation and soil respiration of desert plants?
Example.QuestionCn: 一种用于研究沙漠植物碳同化和土壤呼吸的研究方法的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a research approach used to investigate the carbon assimilation and soil respiration of desert plants includes measuring canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rates using a modified assimilation chamber and the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system. This method was employed to explore the characteristics of carbon source and carbon sink in arid desert areas.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于研究沙漠植物碳同化和土壤呼吸的研究方法包括使用改进的同化室测量冠层表观光合作用和土壤CO2排放速率，以及使用LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统。该方法被用来探讨干旱沙漠地区碳源和碳汇的特征。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a 'modified assimilation chamber' in the context of measuring canopy photosynthesis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在测量冠层光合作用的背景下，什么是“改良同化室”？
Definition.AnswerEn: A modified assimilation chamber in this context refers to a system used to measure canopy apparent photosynthesis. It is designed to improve measurements under specific environmental conditions such as high temperature and irradiation. The chamber is made of acrylic material with high light transmittance and is used in conjunction with the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system to ensure accurate canopy gas exchange measurements.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在这个上下文中，改良的同化室指的是一种用于测量冠层表观光合作用的系统。它旨在改善在特定环境条件下的测量，如高温和高辐射。该同化室由具有高光透过率的亚克力材料制成，并与LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统结合使用，以确保准确的冠层气体交换测量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'soil CO2 efflux rate' mean in studies of desert plant ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: “土壤二氧化碳排放速率”在沙漠植物生态系统研究中是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: The soil CO2 efflux rate in studies of desert plant ecosystems refers to the rate at which carbon dioxide is released from the soil surface into the atmosphere. It is measured using systems like the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system, and it provides insight into the carbon dynamics and respiration activity under plant canopies and in areas of desert bare land.
Definition.AnswerCn: 沙漠植物生态系统中土壤CO2排放速率是指二氧化碳从土壤表面释放到大气中的速率。它通常使用LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统进行测量，能够提供植物冠层下和沙漠裸地区域的碳动态和呼吸活动的洞察。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'canopy apparent photosynthetic rate' in desert plant research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在沙漠植物研究中，“冠层表观光合速率”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: The canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) in desert plant research refers to the rate at which plants convert carbon dioxide and sunlight into organic compounds under their canopy. It is a measure of the photosynthetic efficiency of the plant canopy, which can vary significantly with changes in soil water levels and environmental conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 沙漠植物研究中的冠层表观光合速率（CAP）是指植物在其冠层下将二氧化碳和阳光转化为有机化合物的速率。它是植物冠层光合效率的一个衡量标准，可能会因土壤水分水平和环境条件的变化而显著变化。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using a self-made small lysimeter in desert plant drought stress experiments compare to the methods using an LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system for measuring soil respiration and canopy photosynthesis?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在沙漠植物干旱胁迫实验中，使用自制小型蒸发皿的数据收集方法与使用LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统测量土壤呼吸和冠层光合作用的方法相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The self-made small lysimeter was used to simulate natural conditions and measure water consumption under drought stress, focusing on soil water content and physiological water needs. In contrast, the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system, combined with a modified assimilation chamber, was used to measure soil CO2 efflux rate and canopy photosynthesis, capturing data related to carbon source-sink characteristics in desert plants.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 自制的小型蒸发皿用于模拟自然条件并测量干旱胁迫下的水分消耗，重点关注土壤水分含量和生理水分需求。相比之下，LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统结合改良的同化室，用于测量土壤CO2排放速率和冠层光合作用，捕捉与沙漠植物碳源-汇特征相关的数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between the physiological water consumption experiments conducted with desert plants in 2012 and 2013?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 2012年和2013年对沙漠植物进行的生理水分消耗实验之间的相似性和差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both experiments focused on drought stress treatment with soil water content maintained at specific levels of field capacity. In 2012, experiments were conducted with soil water content at (20±5)%, while in 2013, it was further reduced to (10±3)% to study more severe drought stress effects. Both experiments aimed to understand the physiological water needs and consumption patterns of desert plants.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 两个实验都集中在干旱胁迫处理上，土壤水分保持在特定的田间持水量水平。2012年，实验的土壤水分保持在（20±5）%；而在2013年，土壤水分进一步降低到（10±3）%，以研究更严重的干旱胁迫效应。两个实验的目的是了解沙漠植物的生理水分需求和消耗模式。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the variation in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) observed in different years and months inform our understanding of environmental factors influencing desert plant water use during drought conditions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同年份和月份观察到的冠层表观光合速率（CAP）的变化，如何帮助我们理解在干旱条件下影响沙漠植物水分利用的环境因素？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The variation in CAP could suggest that environmental factors such as soil water availability significantly influence desert plant water use, as increased canopy photosynthesis was noted with improved soil water conditions. This indicates that the plants may adapt their water usage and photosynthetic activity in response to changing water availability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: CAP的变化可能表明环境因素如土壤水分可用性显著影响沙漠植物的水分利用，因为在改善土壤水分条件下观察到了增加的冠层光合作用。这表明植物可能会根据水分可用性的变化调整其水分使用和光合作用活动。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: Given the methods used for measuring canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux, what might be inferred about the technological and methodological advancements necessary for accurate data collection in harsh desert conditions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 鉴于用于测量冠层表观光合作用和土壤CO2释放的方法，可以推断出在恶劣的沙漠环境中进行准确数据收集所需的技术和方法进步是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of a modified assimilation chamber and LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system indicates a need for robust and precise technology capable of withstanding harsh desert conditions. These advancements are crucial for ensuring accurate data collection on photosynthetic and soil respiration processes in such challenging environments.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统表明，需要一种能够承受恶劣沙漠条件的强大而精确的技术。这些进展对于确保在如此具有挑战性的环境中准确收集光合作用和土壤呼吸过程的数据至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the choice of soil water content levels during drought stress experiments in desert plant studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在沙漠植物研究中的干旱胁迫实验中，选择土壤水分含量水平的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of soil water content levels during drought stress experiments is influenced by the aim to simulate natural conditions and stress levels that desert plants typically encounter. In 2012, the soil water content was maintained at (20±5)% of the field capacity, and in 2013, it was further reduced to (10±3)% to intensify the drought stress conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱胁迫实验中，土壤水分含量水平的选择受到模拟自然条件和沙漠植物通常遇到的胁迫水平的影响。2012年，土壤水分含量保持在田间持水量的(20±5)%；而在2013年，为了加剧干旱胁迫条件，进一步降低至(10±3)%。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to measure both canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in desert plant research?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在沙漠植物研究中，测量树冠光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放是重要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Measuring both canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux is crucial to understand the carbon assimilation and release processes in desert plants. These measurements provide foundational data for evaluating the carbon source-sink functions in arid desert regions, helping in assessing the carbon sequestration potential and understanding the balance between fixed and released carbon in these ecosystems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 测量树冠光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放对于理解沙漠植物的碳同化和释放过程至关重要。这些测量提供了评估干旱沙漠地区碳源-汇功能的基础数据，有助于评估碳封存潜力，并理解这些生态系统中固定和释放碳之间的平衡。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the significant differences in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) of desert plants across different years and months?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致沙漠植物在不同年份和月份的冠层表观光合速率（CAP）显著差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The significant differences in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate (CAP) across different years and months are primarily due to variations in soil water availability. Improved soil water conditions enhance canopy photosynthesis, while water scarcity limits it, reflecting the sensitivity of desert plants to changes in soil moisture levels.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 不同年份和月份的冠层表观光合速率（CAP）显著差异主要是由于土壤水分可用性的变化。改善的土壤水分条件增强了冠层光合作用，而水分匮乏则限制了光合作用，反映了沙漠植物对土壤湿度变化的敏感性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using a modified assimilation chamber and LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system for measuring canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate in desert plants?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用改良的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统测量沙漠植物的冠层光合作用和土壤CO2排放速率的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of a modified assimilation chamber and LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system allows for precise measurement of canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate, resulting in significant findings such as the marked increase in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of desert plant Calligonum potanini with improved soil water. It also enables the identification of the desert plant zone as a weak carbon source, providing foundational data for evaluating carbon source-sink functions in arid desert regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统，可以精确测量树冠光合和土壤CO2排放速率，得出了显著的发现，例如，随着土壤水分的改善，沙漠植物Calligonum potanini的树冠表观光合速率显著增加。它还使得识别沙漠植物区作为弱碳源成为可能，为评估干旱沙漠地区的碳源-汇功能提供了基础数据。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary aim of conducting experiments with desert plants using a self-made small lysimeter to simulate natural conditions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用自制的小型蒸渗仪对沙漠植物进行实验以模拟自然条件的主要目的是是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary aim is to study the water consumption patterns under drought stress conditions by selecting typical desert plants, with experiments conducted in both 2012 and 2013 to observe physiological water needs and consumption patterns under varying soil moisture levels.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目的是研究在干旱胁迫条件下典型沙漠植物的水分消耗模式，实验在2012年和2013年进行，以观察在不同土壤湿度水平下的生理水分需求和消耗模式。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to measure the canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate of desert plants like Calligonum potanini in different environmental conditions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 测量沙漠植物如Calligonum potanini在不同环境条件下的冠层表观光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放速率的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to investigate the carbon assimilation and soil respiration of desert plants to provide foundational data for evaluating the carbon source-sink functions in arid desert regions and to offer scientific evidence for studying carbon sequestration potential in arid areas.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究沙漠植物的碳同化和土壤呼吸非常重要，这为评估干旱沙漠地区的碳源-汇功能提供了基础数据，并为研究干旱地区的碳封存潜力提供科学依据。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the intended purpose of exploring the differences in canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of Calligonum potanini in various years and months?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 探讨不同年份和月份中Calligonum potanini的冠层表观光合速率差异的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The purpose is to understand how canopy photosynthesis is influenced by soil water improvement and to assess the impact on carbon fixation and release, identifying the role of desert plant populations as potential carbon sources or sinks in water-scarce environments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该研究的目的是了解土壤水分改善如何影响树冠光合作用，并评估其对碳固定和释放的影响，识别沙漠植物群落在水资源匮乏环境中作为潜在碳源或碳汇的作用。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What specific procedures are used to measure soil CO2 efflux rate and canopy apparent photosynthesis in desert plants under varying environmental conditions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在不同环境条件下，测量沙漠植物土壤二氧化碳排放速率和树冠表观光合作用的具体程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The soil CO2 efflux rate and canopy apparent photosynthesis are measured using the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system with a 20 cm portable chamber for soil measurements. For plant canopy gas exchange, an improved assimilation chamber made of acrylic material with high light transmittance is used, connected to the LI-8100 system, ensuring airtightness between the chamber and base during measurements.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土壤二氧化碳排放速率和树冠表观光合作用使用LI-8100自动土壤二氧化碳通量系统进行测量，该系统配备20厘米的便携式测量室用于土壤测量。对于植物冠层气体交换，使用一种改进的由亚克力材料制成的同化室，该材料具有高光透过率，并与LI-8100系统连接，确保在测量过程中腔室与基座之间的密封性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can the experimental setup be designed to simulate natural conditions for studying water consumption in desert plants under drought stress?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何设计实验装置以模拟自然条件，以研究沙漠植物在干旱胁迫下的水分消耗？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The experimental setup can be designed using a self-made small lysimeter to simulate natural conditions. The soil moisture is maintained at specific field capacity percentages, such as (20±5)% and (10±3)% for different experimental years, to study physiological water needs and water consumption patterns under drought conditions, with each plant species tested in triplicate.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 实验设置可以使用自制的小型蒸发皿来模拟自然条件。土壤湿度保持在特定的田间持水量百分比，例如不同实验年份的（20±5）%和（10±3）%，以研究在干旱条件下的生理需水量和水分消耗模式，每种植物种类进行三次重复测试。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What experimental setup or instruments enable precise measurement of water usage in desert plants under drought stress conditions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 什么实验设置或仪器能够在干旱胁迫条件下精确测量沙漠植物的水分使用情况？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of a self-made small lysimeter simulating natural conditions enables precise measurement of water usage in desert plants under drought stress conditions. This setup allows for controlled experiments with typical desert plants, assessing water consumption patterns with specific soil water content levels.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用自制的小型蒸发皿模拟自然条件，可以精确测量沙漠植物在干旱胁迫条件下的水分使用情况。该装置允许对典型沙漠植物进行控制实验，评估在特定土壤水分含量水平下的水分消耗模式。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do specific technological tools facilitate the assessment of canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in desert plants?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 特定的技术工具如何促进沙漠植物的冠层光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放的评估？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of a modified assimilation chamber and the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system facilitates the assessment of canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in desert plants. These tools allow for precise measurement of gas exchange under various environmental conditions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 改良的同化室与LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统的结合，促进了对沙漠植物的冠层光合作用和土壤CO2排放的评估。这些工具能够在各种环境条件下精确测量气体交换。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What factors enable the evaluation of carbon source-sink functions in arid desert regions through data collection methods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些因素使得通过数据收集方法评估干旱沙漠地区的碳源-汇功能成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Factors that enable the evaluation of carbon source-sink functions include the use of advanced measurement systems like the LI-8100 for soil CO2 efflux and the improved assimilation chamber for canopy photosynthesis. These data collection methods provide foundational data for assessing carbon assimilation and soil respiration in desert ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 评估碳源-汇功能的因素包括使用先进的测量系统，如LI-8100土壤CO2排放仪和改进的同化室用于冠层光合作用。这些数据收集方法为评估沙漠生态系统中的碳同化和土壤呼吸提供了基础数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be significant differences in canopy apparent photosynthetic rates across different years and months when using an assimilation chamber and soil CO2 flux system?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用同化室和土壤CO2通量系统时，不同年份和月份的树冠表观光合速率可能存在显著差异的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The results indicated that the canopy photosynthesis was significantly enhanced with improving soil water, suggesting that variations in environmental conditions such as soil water availability could lead to differences in canopy apparent photosynthetic rates over time.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 结果表明，随着土壤水分的改善，冠层光合作用显著增强，这表明环境条件的变化，如土壤水分的可用性，可能导致冠层表观光合速率随时间的不同而有所差异。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it expected that the soil respiration rate is lower in desert ecosystems compared to areas with plant canopies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么预计沙漠生态系统的土壤呼吸速率低于植被冠层覆盖的地区？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The findings showed that the soil respiration rate of desert ecosystems was lower, and in desert bare land, it was about 50% of that under plant canopy. This could be due to reduced biological activity and organic matter decomposition in arid environments compared to areas with vegetation cover.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究结果显示，沙漠生态系统的土壤呼吸速率较低，在沙漠裸地上，土壤呼吸速率约为植物冠层下的50%。这可能是由于干旱环境中生物活动和有机物分解减少所致，与植被覆盖区域相比。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what technological advancements could potentially address the challenges faced in measuring canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in desert environments?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，哪些技术进步可能会解决在沙漠环境中测量树冠光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放所面临的挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The study's use of a modified assimilation chamber and the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system demonstrates current technological capabilities. Future advancements could include improved sensor technology for higher precision, enhanced data integration systems for better analysis, and more durable materials for equipment to withstand harsh desert conditions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 该研究使用了改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统，展示了当前的技术能力。未来的进展可能包括更高精度的传感器技术、用于更好分析的增强数据集成系统，以及更耐用的材料，以承受恶劣的沙漠条件。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how researchers can simulate natural conditions to study drought stress on desert plants using a small lysimeter.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白研究人员如何能够使用小型蒸发皿模拟自然条件，以研究沙漠植物的干旱胁迫。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The study utilized a self-made small lysimeter to simulate natural conditions and investigate water consumption under drought stress for typical desert plants, with soil moisture levels maintained at specific percentages of field capacity to mimic drought conditions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该研究利用自制的小型蒸发皿模拟自然条件，调查典型沙漠植物在干旱胁迫下的水分消耗，土壤湿度水平保持在田间持水量的特定百分比，以模拟干旱条件。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the methods used to measure canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in high temperature and irradiation environments.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在高温和辐射环境中测量树冠光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放的方法感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The research employed a modified assimilation chamber combined with the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system to measure canopy apparent photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux rate during high temperature and irradiation periods.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该研究采用了改进的同化室，并结合LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统，在高温和高辐射期间测量了树冠表观光合作用和土壤CO2释放速率。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why there is a significant difference in the canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of C. potanini across different years and months.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么C. potanini的冠层表观光合速率在不同年份和月份之间存在显著差异。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The variability in the canopy apparent photosynthetic rate of C. potanini across years and months is attributed to differences in soil water availability, as the study found that canopy photosynthesis was significantly enhanced with improved soil water conditions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: C. potanini 的冠层表观光合速率在不同年份和月份的变异性归因于土壤水分可用性的差异，因为研究发现，在土壤水分条件改善时，冠层光合作用显著增强。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the potential improvements or modifications that could be made to data collection methods for measuring plant canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux in arid desert regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在干旱沙漠地区测量植物冠层光合作用和土壤二氧化碳排放的数据收集方法可能进行的改进或修改。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: In the field above, data collection methods involved using a modified assimilation chamber and the LI-8100 automated soil CO2 flux system to measure canopy photosynthesis and soil CO2 efflux. Improvements could include enhancing the precision of the assimilation chamber, increasing the light transmittance beyond 95%, or using more advanced sensors to capture a broader range of environmental conditions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在上述领域，数据收集方法涉及使用改进的同化室和LI-8100自动土壤CO2通量系统来测量冠层光合作用和土壤CO2排放。改进措施可以包括提高同化室的精度、将光透过率提高到95%以上，或使用更先进的传感器以捕捉更广泛的环境条件。
